blog.description:
I tried a theme. Didn't work out. So instead I filled it with cute puppies. 
Submissions welcome.

posts.summary: Hey! ^^ you’re blog makes me so happy, it’s perfect! Can I request some pitbull puppy’s? ❤️

posts.summary: Hey, me again but this time bad news, one of my best freinds dogs just passed she was a beautiful old Labrador, so if at all...
posts.question: Hey, me again but this time bad news, one of my best freinds dogs just passed she was a beautiful old Labrador, so if at all possible could we get some Labrador pics?
posts.answer: Oh no, i’m so sorry to hear that. I hope your friend is doing okay. Here are some adorable pictures to hopefully remind you of her! :)

reblog.comment: Oh no, i’m so sorry to hear that. I hope your friend is doing okay. Here are some adorable pictures to hopefully remind you of her! :)

posts.summary: Although I love all your content, I want to know if you had pics of 'mucky pups' (as in the British colloquialism, not the band...
posts.question: Although I love all your content, I want to know if you had pics of 'mucky pups' (as in the British colloquialism, not the band from New Jersey) who had either been playing somewhere they shouldn't, or were a little too enthusiastic when eating their dinner.
posts.answer: Of course, hope you enjoy these messy pups! :)
